name: broken-image-finder
description: The scope of the Broken Image Finder Add-On is to detect unavailable images by scanning the currently visited website and its embedded stylesheets.
author: Bastian Dupps

preferences.name: doNotify
preferences.title: Show the Notification Popup?
preferences.description: Disable if you don't want to get notified.

preferences.name: alert403
preferences.title: Alert 403 Status Codes?
preferences.description: Disable if 403 Status Codes should get ignored.

preferences.name: firstRun
preferences.title: Is the Toolbar Button displayed properly?
preferences.description: Uncheck to reset Toolbar Button after restart.
